Description.Text: Built as a parsonage in 1847, this charming country house hotel is hidden away in 15 acres of gardens and woodland in a peaceful and secluded valley in the heart of north Cornwall. The hotel is family-owned and offers period character and traditional style with a high level of comfort, facilities and service. The 10 bedrooms in the house are individually furnished and well equipped with satellite TV, modem connection, tea and coffee facilities and modern bathrooms. The hotel restaurant and bar is popular with both locals and residents and prides itself on an excellent and changing menu featuring locally sourced, fresh produce. Guests have use of the tennis court and the outdoor pool which is open during the summer.
